key.name: idle-activation-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to activate the screensaver when the session is idle.

key.name: lock-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to lock the screen when the screensaver goes active.

key.name: lock-delay
key.description: The number of seconds after screensaver activation before locking the screen.

key.name: show-notifications
key.summary: Show notifications in the lock screen
key.description: Whether notifications are shown in the lock screen or not. This only affects the standard experience.

key.name: embedded-keyboard-enabled
key.summary: Allow embedding a keyboard into the window
key.description: Set this to TRUE to allow embedding a keyboard into the window when trying to unlock. The "keyboard_command" key must be set with the appropriate command.

key.name: embedded-keyboard-command
key.description: The command that will be run, if the "embedded_keyboard_enabled" key is set to TRUE, to embed a keyboard widget into the window. This command should implement an XEMBED plug interface and output a window XID on the standard output.

key.name: user-switch-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to offer an option in the unlock dialog to switch to a different user account.

key.name: status-message-enabled
key.summary: Allow the session status message to be displayed
key.description: Allow the session status message to be displayed when the screen is locked.

key.name: default-message
key.description: This is the message that appears on the lock screen by default.

key.name: ask-for-away-message
key.summary: Whether to ask for an away message when locking the screen
key.description: Whether to ask for an away message when locking the screen.

key.name: font-date
key.description: This is the font that the date uses for the screen locker.

key.name: font-time
key.description: This is the font that the time uses for the screen locker.

key.name: font-message
key.description: This is the font that the away message use for the screen locker.

key.name: show-album-art
key.summary: Display album art on the lock screen
key.description: Set this to true to show album art on the lock screen, if available.

key.name: allow-keyboard-shortcuts
key.summary: Control whether keyboard shortcuts are allowed on the lock screen

key.name: allow-media-control
key.summary: Control whether volume and media player controls are allowed on the lock screen

key.name: show-info-panel
key.summary: Control whether the notification and power widgets are shown on the lock screen

key.name: show-clock
key.summary: Show the clock when the normal wallpaper screensaver is active
key.description: This controls whether the clock is shown while the wallpaper is active. Note, the clock will always show when unlocking, and it will never show if a screensaver plugin is active, regardless of this setting

key.name: floating-widgets
key.summary: Control whether the clock and albumart widgets will randomly change position over time.

key.name: layout-group
key.summary: Keyboard layout group to use when entering your password
key.description: This stores the last active keyboard layout group for entering your password.

key.name: custom-screensaver-command
key.description: If empty, cinnamon-screensaver will be used
